mapper.insert: INSERT INTO opinions (user_id, place_id, content, is_public, likes, dislikes, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{placeId}, #{content}, #{isPublic}, 0, 0, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM opinions WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE opinions SET likes = likes + 1 WHERE opinion_id = #{opinionId}
UPDATE opinions SET dislikes = dislikes + 1 WHERE opinion_id = #{opinionId}
